name: The Flying Fortress
description:
Spacebar to drop bombs. A&D or arrow Keys to move back and forth. Escape to go back to the main menu at any time. Try not to kill any civilians.

All art assets done by the incredibly talented Morgan Mathew. Visit her at http://morganmathew.weebly.com/ or at https://vimeo.com/mrenee155.

Sounds were mixed and found from DePaul's sound Library. Find these sounds at DePaul University in one of the Mac Labs.

Images of B-17s come from the following sites:

http://www.447bg.com/B17%27s%20in%20flight.htm

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boeing_B-17_Flying_Fortress

https://centuryjet.com/shop/airplane-kits/prop-aircraft/boeing-b-17/
